CustomField.description: Custom version of OOB Cancel Request button, the button will be hidden in Cancellation Reason is empty
CustomField.formula: IF (AND( NOT( ISPICKVAL( APT_Cancellation_Reason__c , "") ), OR(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"Request"), ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Authoring"), AND(ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Fully Signed"))), ISPICKVAL(Status_Category__c,"In Filing")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c,"Cancelled Request"))), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementCancel?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__Button_CancelRequest", "Cancel Request"), "_self"), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please select 'Cancellation Reason' to enable this function. If 'Mark Opportunity as Lost' is also selected, system will change Opportunity Stage accordingly.
CustomField.label: Cancel Contract Request
